title: The Heroic Week of Sue Morgan, The Wise Protector
summary: At the age of 80, Sue Morgan discovers her hidden powers while mentoring young minds, using her newfound abilities to protect her neighborhood from an eerie threat, demonstrating that heroes come in all ages and forms.
summaryGerman: Im Alter von 80 Jahren entdeckt Sue Morgan ihre verborgenen Kräfte, während sie junge Menschen betreut. Sie nutzt ihre neu entdeckten Fähigkeiten, um ihre Nachbarschaft vor einer unheimlichen Bedrohung zu schützen und zeigt, dass Helden in allen Altersgruppen und Formen existieren.
summaryDutch: Op 80-jarige leeftijd ontdekt Sue Morgan haar verborgen krachten tijdens het begeleiden van jonge geesten, waarbij ze haar nieuw gevonden vaardigheden gebruikt om haar buurt te beschermen tegen een griezelige dreiging, waarmee ze aantoont dat helden in alle leeftijden en vormen voorkomen.
summaryFrench: À l'âge de 80 ans, Sue Morgan découvre ses pouvoirs cachés tout en mentorant de jeunes esprits, utilisant ses capacités nouvellement trouvées pour protéger son quartier d'une menace étrange, démontrant que les héros viennent de tous les âges et de toutes les formes.

story.text: As Sue sits at her local community center tutoring a group of teenagers in mathematics, she suddenly feels a surge of energy. Her fingertips spark with a mysterious energy, fascinating and alarming her group.
Curious about her newfound powers, Sue experiments at home. She discovers she can manipulate electrical devices with her thoughts. Excited, she decides to keep this development a secret for now.
During a mentoring session, Sue accidentally causes a minor blackout in the center. She uses this moment to subtly restore power, astounded by her mastery over electricity.
News breaks of a mysterious figure interfering with local crime. Sue, feeling responsible and capable, patrols the streets at night, stopping petty thefts and vandalism with her electrical powers.
Sue becomes a local legend—unknown to the public's real identity. She balances her daily life with her nightly heroics, ensuring her neighborhood's safety.

A major crisis emerges as a gang tries to take control of the neighborhood. Sue confronts them, revealing her identity to the gang members but not the public, and disarms the threat with an awesome display of power.
After a week of heroics, Sue feels both exhausted and satisfied. She continues her day job but remains vigilant, ready to protect her community whenever needed.

moral: No matter the age, one can always be a source of strength and protection for their community.
ending: As the sun sets, Sue Morgan smiles, knowing she's made her world a little safer, one spark at a time.
